content: make your own crochet berry & popcorn garland for your christmas tree mantle or anywhere where you want some christmas cheer this old fashioned retro crochet popcorn garland makes a lovely holiday decoration that you can enjoy for years the pdf file contains the written pattern with step by step photos for a realistic popcorn and for the berry along with instructions on how to put it together crochet level easy - you need to be able to read a crochet pattern and know the basic stitches format pdf file pattern written row by row in us terms with side notes and photo tutorial and link to the step by step video language english only video tutorials yes sizes the popcorn is about 3cm in diameter the berry is 1cm in diameter material needed this pattern can be made with any kind of yarn in white and red mine are made with dk yarn also known as light worsted #3 yarn hook s 4mm
